property.name: tenant
property.label: Qlik Tenant
property.description: Qlik Cloud tenant URL (without https://). Leave empty to use QlikConfig__mdt.

property.name: webIntegrationId
property.label: Web Integration ID
property.description: Qlik Web Integration ID. Leave empty to use QlikConfig__mdt.

property.name: appId
property.label: App ID
property.description: Qlik application ID. Leave empty to use QlikConfig__mdt.

property.name: objectIds
property.label: Object IDs
property.description: Comma-separated list of Qlik object IDs

property.name: clientId
property.label: Auth0 Client ID
property.description: Auth0 Client ID for OAuth2 authentication. Leave empty to use QlikConfig__mdt.

property.name: redirectUri
property.label: Redirect URI
property.description: OAuth2 redirect URI (auto-detected if empty). Leave empty to use QlikConfig__mdt.
